---
title: "`tinytable`"
header-includes: \usepackage{tabularray}
---

```{r}
# library(tinytable)
devtools::document()
pkgload::load_all()
options(tt_latexOptions_placement = "H")
x <- mtcars[1:4, 1:5]
```

```{r}
tt(x) |> style_cell(2, 2,
  background = "pink",
  latex = latexOptions(r = 2, c = 3, halign = "c"))
```

```{r}
tt(x) |> style_column(align = "cllrl")
```

```{r}
tt(x) |> style_column(background = "olive", color = "white")
```

```{r}
tt(x) |>
  style_row(2, latex = latexOptions(cmd = "\\LARGE\\texttt")) |>
  style_column(2, latex = latexOptions(cmd = "\\footnotesize\\texttt"))
```

```{r}
tt(x) |> style_column(c(1, 4), italic = TRUE)
```

```{r}
tt(x) |> style_row(2:3, background = "olive", color = "white")
```

```{r}
tt(x) |> style_row(2:3,
  latex = latexOptions(
    cmd = "\\texttt"
    ))
```


```{r}
tt(x,
  html = htmlOptions(
    class = "table table-striped"),
  latex = latexOptions(
    theme = "plain",
    hlines = "dotted,fg=blue",
    vlines = "dashed,fg=red,wd=1pt")
)
```

```{r}
tt(x)
```
